title: An Important Item
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>Phew, there were many things that I should reflect on from today’s practice.... I should write them down before I forget....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Huh, I thought I had a pen with me until just now.... Where could I have placed it.... Did I leave it on the roof....!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Good afternoon! Eh, why are you looking all over the place like that, Dia-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Ayumu-san. To tell you the truth, I lost the pen I was carrying earlier....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Oh no! I’ll help you look for it. What was the pen like?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>It’s a blue pen with a mascot dolphin on it. I just bought it the other day to match with Kanan-san....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>A blue pen with a dolphin on it.... Umm~, Dia-san, is it the one tucked in your notebook....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Eh.... Eh!? It was in my notebook all this time.... I’m sorry, Ayumu-san....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>It’s nothing. I’m glad we found it! Matching items are really special after all, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Uuu.... You’re right, but it’s embarrassing when you say it out loud....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
